name: Her Scent
description:
Weeping Valley's most famous blind cop, Carter Sheridan, meets a criminal who will give him hints to arrest a bigger fish. Of course, Mrs Erin will play around to test Sheridan's skills.

Uncover The Foxes' leader solving puzzles and carefully paying attention to Erin's words. We encourage you to take notes to feel like a true detective and don't miss any important details.

This game was developed for the "I don't know how to write but I want to tell a story" 2020 Game Jam.

Music by: Michael Lupo (@Sorax)

Narrative design by: Marina Moreno
